description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at: Department of National Defence 25 CFSD Montreal 6363 Notre Dame St. E Montreal, Quebec H1N 1V9 Department of National Defence 7 CF Supply Depot 195 Ave & 82nd St., Bldg. 236 Edmonton, Alberta T5J 4J5 by or before 160 calendar days after contract award. Item 1, GSIN: 8340, NSN: 8340-21-897-6881, TENT Part No.: 8790069-1, NCAGE: 35907 Quantity: 25 Unit of Issue: EA to be delivered to CFSD Montreal Item 2, GSIN: 8340, NSN: 8340-21-897-6881, TENT Part No.: 8790069-1, NCAGE: 35907 Quantity: 25 Unit of Issue: EA to be delivered to CFSD Edmonton Item 3, GSIN: 8340, NSN: 8340-21-859-3003, PIN, TENT Part No.: D373091, NCAGE: 35907 Quantity: 2,500 Unit of Issue: EA to be delivered to CFSD Montreal Item 4, GSIN: 8340, NSN: 8340-21-859-3003, PIN, TENT Part No.: D373091, NCAGE: 35907 Quantity: 2,500 Unit of Issue: EA to be delivered to CFSD Edmonton Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
full_summary:
#W8486-238637/Tent and Pin
## Government Tender Announcement

*   **Contract Reference Number**: PW-22-01010462
*   **Solicitation Number**: W8486-238637/A
*   **Publication Date**: October 19, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date**: January 20, 2023 2:00:00 PM

### Tender Overview
The Department of National Defence invites you to participate in a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of tents and pins.

### Items to be Delivered
The following items are required:

1.  50 Tents (25 for CFSD Montreal and 25 for CFSD Edmonton)
2.  5,000 Pins (2,500 for CFSD Montreal and 2,500 for CFSD Edmonton)

### Purchase Information
Delivery of the items must be made to the following addresses:

*   CFSD Montreal: 25 CFSD Montreal, 6363 Notre Dame St. E, Montreal, Quebec H1N 1V9
*   CFSD Edmonton: 7 CF Supply Depot, 195 Ave & 82nd St., Bldg. 236, Edmonton, Alberta T5J 4J5

### Language of Documents
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada: English or French.

### Important Deadlines
*   Tender Closing Date: January 20, 2023 2:00:00 PM
*   Contract Award Date: On or before 160 calendar days after contract award

### Contact Information
For more information please contact Deborah Moldowan at deborah.moldowan@forces.gc.ca or 819-939-0832.

### Tender Documents
The tender documents are available at the following links:

*   English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/19/01474bdc6e9c0dc69d859e07845e91d9/w8486-238637_rfq_eng.pdf
*   French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/19/7883bf5797d32dd04340fb3fdd1b9a45/w8486-238637_rfq_frc.pdf

### Trade Agreements & Region of Opportunity
This tender is open to suppliers under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The opportunity
